content.detailedDescription: I was on my boyfriends apartment balcony and took two pictures of the sunlight.  i noticed the orbs after i took the picture. when i looked up at the sky i did not see abything. the sun was very brights that day with few clouds. it appears to be some kind of orb that moved quickly between the tine i took two photos. it appears to have some pattern of lights on it. i can not think of any possible explation of what it might be. there is a small airport in the area bur it doesnt look like any object i have ever seen before. i am unsure as to what a weather baloon looks like but this object moved from higher in the sky to lower in the sky within the seconds of the picture being taken.
content.summary: Images in 2 photos that were taken.

content.detailedDescription:
Before leaving my work i had noticed a light in the sky in the distance. it would be to the north of where i was. it appeared to be just hanging in the sky.  as i pulled out of the driveway, the light came closer, it was a plane. 
 
then i started driving home [i work overnight ]. it was after 7am and before 7:30.  the sun was coming up, and i wanted to catch it on my phone, camera . 

i had been driving about 20 minutes, i looked over to my left and saw this light in the sky.  i kept looking at it as it got closer. i really thought it was just a plane. i snapped a picture of it and didn't think about it until later.  
i just thought it was weird that this plane was as low as it was, going the direction it was.
later the same day i was looking at the pictures and noticed that the plane turned into a boomerang.  and another picture i had taken that morning had two round lights in the sky.  they looked like a set of eyes. [goosebumps]

i'm always taking pictures of the sunsets or sunrises.  ive got some other pictures that have questionable orbs or lights in them: but i always dismissed it.  now i'll pay more attention; and i'll be looking at pictures of the past.

i will add, i went to a conference in june {discussing ufo's and more}.  while there i met a man that claims to have been abducted, and claims to have an implant.{i believe him} he lives in another state, but we have stayed in contact with each other.  well, sort of.  after a few emails and phone conversations, it's like he fell off the planet.  then oct 17, i get an email from him apologizing for not staying in touch.  {he had a horrific few months}.  he was concerned that the "beings" would try to come after me. then i emailed him back, several times before that mon 20th {when i saw this boomerang}.  this was his work email so he didn't even read them until after the fact.
 
see, he accepted jesus christ the weekend of the conference. he told me and my friend about his abduction at 13: his x-ray of a broken foot and the implant.  he is now in his 60's.  he has only told a select few about his 'situation'.  
these 'beings' came back for him, trying to convince him that "no amount of praying would do any good".  since he is new to christ, he believed them. they are liars from the pit of hell.  persons that are being tormented by these beings can find hope in jesus,  they [the beings] fear him [jesus].

so, it might be like my friend said, they want to come after me.  they might give me the creeps but, i've got a more powerful weapon.  jesus!
content.summary: I was on my way home from working overnight.  i could tell the sun rise was going to be beautiful so i was taking pics w/phone.  looked to my left & saw what i thought was an airplane. took pic.Looding at it later it didn't look like a plane.

content.detailedDescription: I went outside to take my wife's dog out and was looking up to check out stars but noticed a cloud coverage that had came in 2 hours after taking out my dog was starting to look down and noticed an airplane flying from west to east at high alt. but still under the cloud coverage as i could make out it's lights blinking and was following it visually as i waited for my dog to do his business and noticed another plane about the same as the other flying east to west but it made a funny move like it was trying to avoid something and thought that was weird and then i noticed what it was trying to avoid. a low flying large v shaped craft flying from the south west to the north east with 3 bright and large lights on the under side of the craft the one light at the front of the v was a little smaller than the other 2 and i would say they were placed about the mid point rather than at the back of craft at the points. it never deviated from its path going along at a fairly good clip from the time that i saw it break cover from the building that was blocking it from my view till i lost it was about 40 sec. no more than a min. i live down town just on the east side of the high rise building so i get a fairly good view on clear nights being able to make out orion, mars, and a few other constellations. now as far as what i was feeling not a lot really i was a little taken back at it but other than that nothing else. i have not told my wife yet though as we have been going through a lot and do not really want to add to what is going on.
content.summary: V shaped object with 3 big white lights on the under side

content.detailedDescription: This took place on 10-24-14 @ 7:42pm my wife was on the back deck cooking n the grill i was in side preparing more food when she yelled inside to come out here. at this time i went out to the back deck you couldn't miss the object heading south right toward our house. it was pure white light almost hurt you eyes to look at it as it got closer we could see it was odd shaped like two plates put together with a dome on top. my wife and i watched it for a moment looking at each other in amazement when i said get the camera so i ran got the camera and we began tacking pics. one of the pics turned out ok but the closer pic was distorted. we took pics of this while the object was hovering above our power pole. now the thing i find really strange is the fact that when we started taking photos it abruptly stopped hovering and began to head west. at this time it started to ascend in the sky changes to a orange red color and then it was gone straight up. i had not noticed the what the pics actually captured until until i resized the photo and saw the structure of the craft but you be the judge. like i said this was over our house
content.summary: Coking in the grill on the back deck saw a verry low silent object aproching

content.detailedDescription: This 5 ufo's was flying in the kanpur cantt area sky and changing direction without gravity rule , and scan with lasers
content.summary: This 5 ufo's was flying in the kanpur cantt area sky and changing direction without gravity rule , and scan with lasers

content.detailedDescription: It was a little after 9:30 pm. i had just finished putting my kids to bed. i was in my kitchen rinsing out a glass to pour a soda for my wife. i looked up and out of the kitchen window that is directly behind the sink. i often do this to watch the commercial flights come in while i am doing dishes. as i looked up i first noticed a plane with its typical flashing lights pass by on the usual eastward flight path, coming in for a landing at the ft. lauderdale intl airport. i have seen this many, many times before. then just as the plane went out of sight behind the trees, a light blinked on in the west and caught my eye. i watched it flash 3-4 more times, with about a one second interval, give or take few tenths, although it was definitely the same interval between each blink/flash. it was almost like a light on a plane or helicopter being controlled digitally. i even thought at first that it was a plane on the westward approach, which is further out in the distance than the eastward approach, but the light appeared to be in the middle somewhere, where no planes should be. it also seemed too high in elevation to be a helicopter. i watched that same point in the sky for at least 30 more seconds after the last blink before taking my eyes away. it never reappeared there or anywhere in sight. i immediately checked my phone and noted the time to be 9:41 eastern standard time. i then ran out to the back patio without even pouring the drink, to tell my wife what i had just witnessed. i know it's not much. i have no photo evidence or other witnesses to back me up, but i am sure of what i saw. thank you for everything do. i hope to hear back.
content.summary: Flashing white light near commercial airline flight path, that flashed on and off for a few seconds before disappearing

content.detailedDescription: I was leaving my parents house at 7:40 pm local time to head back home.  as i was about to leave their driveway, a huge and very bright red ball in the sky caught my eye.  it went off as soon as i saw it, then reappeared and stayed lit and motionless for about 5 secs before "turning off."  a few seconds after that there were two white blinking lights in tandem to each other heading from east to west.  there were some cloudiness tonight and the two lights seemed to go above the clouds.  my dad saw the red ball too, we discussed for a moment and looked at those blinking lights as they headed above the clouds.  everything seemed calm.  on my way back to town i notice the two lights again...They were heading east now.  right behind a brighter orange-reddish light took the center stage.  my wife and i said "how weird"...And really didn't think anything about it.  part of the road we were driving on had trees that obscured our viewing angle for a short time.  we made a turn and now had a field adjacent to us.  we had full vision of the area again.  our hearts sank.  we saw 6 of the very bright red balls lined up.  not perfectly straight..But kind of like an edge of a bowl.  it spanned several miles across.  they went out almost simultaneously then we could see everything else going in the sky.  there were at least 15 different flashing lights in the sky now.  it wasn't a constant flashing..But more like a fading in and out.  a few did flash tho.  you could follow a light and see it turning abruptly.  it almost appeared too they were going in a big circle.  during this time, numerous other red balls of lights were appearing randomly across the sky.  i got on the phone with my parents now just north of my new viewing area and they were seeing the same thing.  it was scary.  we were literally parked in the middle of a dark road looking at all this.  we knew we could sit here all night.  i debated on calling the county dispatch..Or even calling the news in san angelo, tx about it.  i figured other people are undoubtedly seeing this and would call this in.  to me, there was so much activity in the sky it almost looked like a mini war up there.  we left when the activity still on going.  as we pulled up to our house and got out of the car i could here jets going by.  definitely something strange was going on tonight.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Numerous lights in the sky

content.detailedDescription: Me and my girlfreind have been watching a tri color stationary star like object in the night we have seen this object on a few other occasions this star like object is being seen all over the country..Tonight 10/27/14 me and three other people were standing on 112 st in troy watching this object becouse it was so bright and changing colors from red to blue to white as we were standing there observing the colored object a bright white light suddenly flickered into veiw below the object and became very bright,we all said some explatives when it suddenly started moving off from a stationary position under the object we were watching..This light glided of going south until it disappeared in the night sky,,this however is not what made me decide to file a report, as we were walking back toward my apt still in awe of what we had seen and looking at the night sky as we walked i saw something that confused my sense of reality? so to speak...What we saw was a large group of very dull lights gliding over head in a loose v formation..I have seen many strange lights in the sky but never have i seen anything like this,they looked about as bright as what a dying glow stick would look like, there were maybe ten to twelve of them. if you were not already looking at the sky it would not have been seen they were that dull but glided past very fast, about ten seconds later from the other direction we again saw three dull orb like lights silently glide over head in the other direction towards the adirondacks.. also as a side note,,the amount of low flying aircraft in the sky tonight was unbelievable and i would like to mention that if we did not know better it seemed like these aircraft were there to hide what ever is going on in the night sky, i live less than ten miles from the albany airport so aircraft in the sky is a normal sight but what got our attention was the strobing lights these planes and helicopters were flashing. after we got back as we were standing in the yard the last thing we saw before going inside was what i can only describe as a bright pinpoint of light extremley high up just smoothly gliding across the sky going from east to west.It did not look like a satalite this thing was to bright.
content.summary: Several barley visible orbs glided over head in a loose v formation

content.detailedDescription: O l was walking my dog home when l saw orange lights to my right in the sky. at first l thought for a second it was a helicopter but then realised it must be some thing else and not a plane [to low] it pass in front of me from right to left.It was 7.20pm clear sky can see the stars  l was looking very hard at this as it went in front of me. l can see 4 large orange looking lights. l think the lights are about as big as a bus. and very close together. l could only see a little bit of outline. black and pointed like a arrow at the back of it. but what shocked me was l could here nothing?. l did here an see planes a few minutes later miles away which made me think even more that l should have herd something. it went towards the sea. l then decided to ring an let the police know.
content.summary: Walking my dog home saw large orange lights moveing across sky in front of me. hearing no sound

content.detailedDescription:
I was leaving for work. as i unlocked car, i looked up and observed the constellation of orion, and to the left of that the star sirius. in direct line with rigel and sirius, to the left of sirius, i observed a third star-like light, of nearly the same brightness as sirius, that i did not recognize. it was about the same 'distance' from sirius as sirius is from rigel. my first thought was, "i wonder what planet that is." i looked back at orion, then followed the line from rigel to sirius to this star or planet and thought, when i get to work i need to look that up. i opened my car door, looked back at orion, then sirius, then nothing. the star/planet had disappeared.

i immediately checked the surrounding sky conditions and saw that there were some high, thin clouds directly overhead. though i couldn't see any clouds in the area where the star had been, i waited a couple of minutes to see if it would reappear from behind a cloud. it didn't, and i saw no obscuring clouds in the area where this star/planet/object had disappeared.
content.summary: Saw an unknown star or planet that then vanished.

content.detailedDescription: i was in small two street neighborhood across street from my moms house walking dogs after feeding them. beautiful clear night im always looking up at the stars & sky on our walks... we live next to lg state park with a bit lower light pollution... this was my first sighting ever... im pretty excited!!!! :o in the north sky at about a 45 degree angle i see a briefly stationary large cigar shaped light brightest in the middle with light fading out to either end.  when i first seen it.. it was still for a second before moving in a slight decent angled away a little... the first thing that came to mind for me was a shooting star... but it was much two large, and brightest part was in middle fading to each tip, very unusual, much larger than my biggest shooting star sighting plus much much closer compared to a star.... the light was not as bright as a shooting star, slightly faded possibly do to distance... being open minded i couldn't say if it was a ufo or an entity or something else beyond our understanding of natural... this was nothing at all like any plain or flying object ive ever seen in the sky... oh and i seen my share of spot lights in the sky... this thing took off through the sky like a magnet rail train from a still position which one of the reasons shooting star came to mind.. the whole sighting lasted maybe 5 secs at most which is a long time compaired to a shooting star of course... it slightly faded out in the sky... the lighting affect never changed during movement "brightest in middle fading out to equal tips front and back during entire movement & fade out... perfect cigar shape... i looked at my phone after a minute of amazement, knowing i wittnessed something! it said 7:25 so id say exact time was 7:24
content.summary: Cigar shaped light, brightest in middle, stationary then faded out on decent... very large compared to any aircraft ect

content.detailedDescription: While driving i noticed something burning in the night sky. i pointed it to my wife who jumped out and took a picture with her phone. upon examining the photo we enlarged it and what we saw in the picture was not a human craft. as we watched the object took off straight up into the night sky until it disappeared from sight.
content.summary: Ball of fire in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
I was purposely out taking pictures hoping to get a few clips of ufo's daytime vessels. its was around 12:20pm in my field outback in abbotsford when i spotted this high flying jetliner  coming from the east and just a tiny bit south of me and heading directly west. i felt that it was leaving a pretty heavy contrail so i started to take consecutive photos about a second and a half apart when i got to my computer and uploaded well lets just say again i was floored as to what was present in our atmosphere or who? and whats the huge interest they have in our planes.  
ps. those are not sun refractions on the plane. imo it is the white entities that are lighting up that plane. most important these photo's have not been touched or altered in anyway
                                                  yours truly

[name removed/cms/tg]
content.summary: I call this a jetliner attack as i took these photos i didn't notice the entities until i uploaded to my computer and was floored to see all the activity!

content.detailedDescription: Last year we saw a variety of sky anomalies, from lightning like to a metallic star shape, orbs, mists, light changing shape thingies, and an energy ball with changing faces in it
content.summary: Mixed anomolies

content.detailedDescription:
This ufo pic taken from kanpur city at midnight 12:10 am ufo was glowing 
and sens laser light looks like search the entire area the laser light color was white and red.
content.summary: This ufo pic taken from kanpur city at midnight 12:10 am ufo was glowing  and sens laser light looks like search the entire area the laser light color was white and red

content.detailedDescription: my fiancé and i were sitting in the back yard enjoying pinion wood burning in the chimneys, when we noticed what we thought was an unusually large number (as we thought) were satellites going intermittently in different directions that didn't fade out but disappeared. i was looking to the west at the top of the tree line when a large orange red ball flew into sight going south to north at a very high rate of speed. i told my fiancé to look quick and then it just disappeared . no sound no explosion just vanished. never saw anything like it and i've been watching the skies for 45odd years
content.summary: Some sati lite type lights and large bright  orange red light at very high speed than vanished

content.detailedDescription:
I was in the backyard 10:30pm friday 10/24/14 with my dogs.  i saw a black "v" shape with 4 round yellow lights going down the outer sides,directly above my head traveling east to west.  it was pretty fast and about as high as planes fly from dia over my neighborhood.  it only lasted about 5 seconds before it disappeared over some houses. 

i went and got my husband.  about 5 minutes later it reappeared directly above us again.  this time it was going from north to south.  it had the same lights but this time they moved in kinda an undulating motion with the lights moving independently from each other.  it reminded me of a octopus tenticle gently waving up and down.  one of the lights from the middle of the formation actually moved itself up and around the side and repositioned itself further out from the others.

we saw it again at about 15 minutes later directly above very high going northeast to southwest.  this time it was back in the black "v" formation. same amount of 4 lights going down the sides.

our family (myself, my husband, son age 12, daughter age 15)saw the same craft saturday 10/25/14 multiple times starting at 7:30pm to around 11:00pm.  we saw 3 other types but i will make another report because they are different shaped.
content.summary: Black v shape with 4 lights going down the 2 outer sides, traveling from east to west. location;  englewood, co

content.detailedDescription: Was watching the blood moon.  several additional orbs were present and observed, and photographed.  also saw a huge blue ball up by the moon, that kept knocking the power out of my camera batteries.  one larger blue orb that came up my driveway, brightened when i said "hi"  the one up by the moon moved quite rapidly, and seemed to not want to be photographed.
content.distance: 20 Feet or Less, 21-100 Feet, 101-500 Feet, 501 Feet - 1 Mile, Over 1 Mile
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Orbs and ball of energy by the moon

content.detailedDescription: Had just gotten home and noticed a bright yellow/amber light in the south western sky. the light was far brighter than those of airplanes that frequently fly over or i would have not paid it any attention. upon standing there and observing the object, i immediately noticed the entire object was glowing. i observed no blinking lights of any kind on the object. once it got almost directly overhead, i knew i was looking at something out of the ordinary. no sound, absolutely silent. the entire object was indeed glowing as you can see in the photo's. the object continued to fly overhead and eventually out of site. i dont know what it was but i know what it wasn't...It wasn't from anywhere around here.
content.summary: Boomerang shaped craft, totally silent

content.detailedDescription: I really want to get with some array believers to talk about the array.
content.summary: Ufo hovering as star upper atmosphere then moving around fast

content.detailedDescription: At home, i walked by the master bedroom window and noticed a “star” that looked differently than the others.  it caught my attention.  i stopped and stayed long enough to witness the lights flash different colors - red, green, yellow, white.  it appeared to be one object.  then the object/lights would ascend and descend, and move side to side but always staying within its general area.  i looked at it through a set of binoculars and i witnessed the colored lights were more definitively round and they flashed on and off in almost a pattern.  i saw three different planes traverse my view horizon as it related to the lights.  i knew they were planes with their distinctive flashing plane-like lights and they were going in a straight horizontal direction.  i was glad i was able to compare known flying objects (the planes) with something that didn't register as something i was familiar with.  at one point i said aloud to the light source, "you have no interest in me anymore, do you?"  i have had my own curiosities/experiences from childhood to early adulthood that are questionable and unresolved.   my partner and i watched it for about a half hour and stopped watching it altogther.  then in a cavalier way, we both said to each other, "ok it’s a ufo and does it really matter anymore?"  observing this ufo was our experience and we have no recourse to tell our story expect maybe here.  so, there was this resignation that fell on us.  we both agreed this sighting is not unlike others we’ve heard about, and this will continue.  so now what?  unless humankind is in a big petri dish and we have no control in this manner or setup, then does it matter anymore?  the world has seen ufos like forever, we’ve seen crop circles pop up worldwide for some time, we hear about underwater activity that can’t be explained, and like many other people i’ve had my own visits at night with the mysterious owl when i was a kid.  i would think it would be great to have global conscious contact with these unknowns but maybe it’s never meant to be or not be right now.  maybe humankind will have this available to us to in about a thousand more years?  thank you for allowing this forum to be here to give my account of this ufo observation.
content.summary: Spotted a light gluster in sky with red green yellow while lights flashing on and off. object would go up and down, side to side

content.detailedDescription: I was driving north from woodbury area to paseo westpark area. i first noticed a black disk like object hovering over what seemed like tustin district area. it didn't move, or have any lights. then i noticed 2 black/dark helicopters flying away from the object. as i turned on irvine center drive towards culver, i saw the object directly in front of me. the object seemed to be hovering for at least 6 minutes or so. then as i got closer, it seemed to have moved at a rapid speed towards north. i then followed it to tustin ranch road where it was about 300 feet from the ground flying almost parallel to tustin ranch road right by the 2 large hangers. once i reached walnut, the object flew ne in tremendous speed. at this point, i could not even see it in the sky as it had flew super fast, very far away. i thought at this point it must have been an airplane. i turned around to head back to paseo westpark, when i looked in my rear view mirror and saw the object was back hovering over the district area. this could not be an airplane as it hovered for long periods of time, flew with great speed, then somehow turned around and came back to the same spot within a couple minutes. i again made a u turn to follow the object when it just disappeared. at this point, the sun was setting and got very dark so i couldn't see it even if it was up in the sky. i'd like to add that there were several commercial planes flying into sna that must have seen this object.
content.distance: 21-100 Feet, 101-500 Feet, 501 Feet - 1 Mile, Over 1 Mile
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Ufo over tustin/irvine, multiple paths

content.detailedDescription: A small light source in the sky, i started running for a better view then it drops. it didn't go at an angle like it was entering atmosphere, like a comet, it went straight down. fast. there was a growing trail behind it as it fell and a wake around it like a boomerang (as in fell so fast it caused it) i got scared of the force of the impact on the town of clarence! then it just stopped above the trees and went out. then i noticed a small light source again above the trees. i literally flinched expecting an explosion!
content.summary: I saw something crazy 4 winters ago in clarence. i'm a film producer.

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were traveling westbound on kings highway in king george, va at roughly 38.277993, -77.209848 when to the west my wife and i both noticed several unusual objects in the sky. at first glance they looked like very short contrails but as we continued to observe them we noticed that they were stationary and not becoming longer like a contrail. i was driving and had to pay attention to the road but my wife says she counted 9 of these disc shaped objects before they disappeared one at a time.  by the time she took pictures only two remained. i think in a couple of the pictures there are three of them.

not only did we see these objects to the west but we both saw one blinking orange star like object which was roughly to the south of our position at approximately 45 degrees (just taking a guess on that). i saw this object looking out the driver’s side window while still traveling westbound. it looked a lot like a very bright mars but i am certain it was not a planet or an airplane. it was not quite dark yet and no stars were visible at that time. it was unlike anything i have seen in the sky before. i looked at it and it disappeared. it did not blink like an airplane and i wouldn't exactly say it pulsated. it was more like a slow steady blink with roughly 10-15 seconds between blinks until it just disappeared. it seemed stationary and i definitely believe it was in our atmosphere and not in space. i feel that the star like object was closer to us but it is very hard to tell.

i consider myself a logical minded person and try not to jump to conclusions so i will say i have no idea exactly what these objects were but to see the unusual objects to the west and then the one to the south within a few minutes of each other was very intriguing. now i only wish i would have pulled over to get more/better pictures especially of the star like object.

i firmly believe we are not alone in the universe but cannot say i have any evidence.  my wife is more of a skeptic and after this event i asked her if she believes we are alone after witnessing these objects she replied with a firm, "no". she said it was, "creepy". i don't know if these objects originate on this planet or from somewhere else but i do know that they were undoubtedly unusual.

personally i felt excited to witness something like this. i am curious to know what these objects are and from where they originate.

i am attaching the original unedited photos.  i apologize for the quality as they are iphone photos through the windshield of a moving vehicle. these are the photos of the remaining objects to the west. keep in mind that there were nine of these according to my wife and they disappeared one at a time. when i zoomed in on them (picture number 8 specifically) i was amazed to see that classic ufo shape. the star like object had completely disappeared by the time the pictures were taken. i am open to thoughts and suggestions as to what these objects could be.
content.summary: Several disc shaped objects and orange starlike blinking object

content.detailedDescription:
Spotted ufo above me to the right. seemed like large bird at first. no sound. then a second later, a large glider, then a 747 sized v-shaped aircraft moving quietly aprox 60 miles an hour. roughly at low helicopter level. as it continued its path a stationary light from below bounced reflected off the bottom of the craft. the body was lack & shiney and reflective with two non-reflective panels under each wing.
as it disappeared behind a treeline heading away from me, towards the airport, i can see two aircraft flying slightly towards one other, yet some distance from each other. suddenly they both simultaneously took evasive action. trying to avoid something in the air directly ahead of their own flight paths. called 911, then the tv staton the newsroom person said she was monitoring a bank of police scanners an had heard there were sighting from different people reporting to the police.
cop came and said that, " the military flies around at night with there lights off many times. the funny thing about what the cop said was that it was dark. 
i never told him it was dark...Only silent.
content.summary: See discription below

content.detailedDescription:
I was out side waiting with grandson for his mother to pick him up, and as i'm always looking up saw what appeared to be a plane with trail it looked odd to me it was more like a half circle not the shape of a plane and 1 trail coming from it, the evening light was shinning on it which made it look pink like. so i took photo of it with iphone. when i zoomed in in iphoto was quite thrilled with what i saw, would you believe nobody else was!  it just went from one side of sky to another, just kept on going ( away from sydney airport which i live near ) some months previous not sure when i noticed when i was at my old home and sitting outside on balcony round about 5pm again something else odd so took video, and ran to back of house as it flew over to film it some more, but it didn't appear !! although i have it on my computer. now i will say that back in the 60's i did see something else odd that didn't fit, and that was it, i'm a believer. i go much deeper than most people, am spiritual too, with eyes wide open. have access to apple tv so i am looking all the time on youtube for ufo like mine. i get disappointed with most channels who also go into conspiracies, etc., then i saw your stuff, ah i said thats for me. if you don't mind an opinion, i would like to air one, there is evidence every where that we where visited long ago, its so obvious that everything that was left in stone was not from primitive man, it all says we where here. then the crop circles, phenomena yes but oh so intelligent, we are used to them now, next is escalating sightings and proof of, and now weather phenomenon, clouds etc, saying look what we can do, look up! 
on a recent visit to my son in queensland country i sat outside (with no light pollution ) looking at the stars,( can't see them that clear where i live) after an hour was going indoors when i saw coloured lights 2 lots blinking oh great i thought 2 planes it was 2.30am when i told my son as a joke he informed me that planes aren't allowed to fly at that time !!
content.summary: Am always looking up waiting with grandson to be picked up, it looked odd 1 trail i took photo with iphone

content.detailedDescription: There is definitely something above the orion belt in this area. i thought it was venus at first, but it moves up and down so quickly probably about 45° above  orion belt. it has moved very radically up-and-down. a lot of these people are full of crap, but the people that saw the thing that looked like a star but it was orange and moved very erratically much faster than a plane and up-and-down sideways everything. it's still out there, but it's gotten much brighter, so i think it's getting closer..
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: There is definitely something above the orion built in this area.

content.detailedDescription: I went out on the back porch of my fathers house to let the dogs out at about 8:45 pm (pdt) on october 26th. i  was looking up at the stars in the sky to the south. i then noticed what i thought might be a large star that appeared orange in color.It appeared almost circular in shape and kind of a hazy orange color. within a few seconds it almost appeared to open like an egg cracking open and in the center there was a red orb and the hazy orange color surrounded it. then it was almost as if it closed and went back to all orange and then it just vanished. i continued to watch and had my brother looking up with me to see if the light returned, thinking maybe it was a plane light or a satelite but the light never returned. it all happened within a matter of seconds and i even started to question whether something had exploded extremely high in the sky. i notified the american meteorlogic society and attempted to contact the faa to see if there had been any satelites or planes that had exploded. it made me think of what an exploding star would look like because it was stationary, not like a meteor with a tail.
content.summary: Looked like a large orange star, the it was as if it split open with a red orb in the center  with the orange surrounding it then it went back to all orange and disappeared almost as if it was something exploding

content.detailedDescription:
i was walking home from loves country store going west down broadway and turned north on 2nd street and that's when i noticed a bluish object hovering in the sky that intensified in brightness as i watched.
 i quickly drop my groceries and reach for my cell phone and started recording it. while i was recording i noticed a couple of small white lights blinking & were heading towards the blue object. when the first one got close it started moving away eastwardly and when one got very close to it, it just winked out.
 the smaller white blinking objects kept heading east in the direction the blue thing was going & on my way home i saw two more blinking lights going towards the east in the same area.
 i believe the small blinking lights were fighters because of their speed but for some reason i couldn t hear a sound coming from them. they could have been higher than i thought but i don't believe so. you can see on the video how far away they were. the sound you hear on the video is from the highway not the objects.
 the objects were almost directly above the football stadium over in the north part of town and i question some people from the game and they said they heard nothing and saw nothing. it seems that if they were some type of conventional aircraft they would have definitely heard them. somebody would have heard them.
 if you take a close look at the video and zoom in and look around you'll see that there is a blinking object coming from the north, which is the direction i'm facing, and you'll definitely see the one that closes in & comes right up to the object as it is heading east and vanishes. they were either checking it out or part of its entourage.
 we have an air force base over in altus about 45 miles from here but they house galaxy class transport planes (c-5s). i've never seen any fighters from there and i've never seen them escort anything before like this. i'vsouthwest oklahoma and its wide open territory where they test things i just another of the oddities of southwest oklahoma and its wide open territory where they test things i believe.From the red river south of us to i-40 north of us which, covers about 70 miles or so, there is nothing but complete barren territory. they could pretty much start another "area 51" here. lol but seriously people do see a lot of strange things around here day and night. my youtube site is "paladone101" if you want to see some of my other sightings. the one about the cylindrical ufo i already reported to you guys. i see a lot of things here but they're usually too fast for me to get on video and it's hard to make people believe you if you don't have proof.
 if i'm forgetting anything or leave something out or you need more information let me know you got my number. 
 this is the second time i reported this because i believe my first report eariler today didn't go through because of bad connection if it did i'm sorry.
    later!
content.summary: Walking home i noticed a very bright blue object hovering a good distance above me. l got my phone out & started recording & suddenly a few small white blinking lights came towards the blue object which started moving east & vanished.

content.detailedDescription:
In my backyard smoking a cigarette just looking at the sky (i always look to the stars), i have been seeing a few odd orb-shaped objects in the last few weeks (they appear to be dim stars but with sudden flashbulb effect and then sudden movement, with extreme-angle changes in flight path/rate of travel)
earlier this evening i saw what was probably a communications satellite traveling due-south/due-north with no variance in course or rate of travel, but on this sighting i was just about to go back inside when i looked to the east and saw a very large triangular shape moving at very high rate, but just an outline, as if it were cloaked or transparent, it quickly disappeared behind very thin upper-atmosphere cloud cover heading southeast. i had an experience as a small child (about 5 yrs old)that involved a very large craft (like an upside-down aircraft carrier at very low altitude, and two military aircraft tracking, at the time i had the overwhelming sense that time had been suspended and i wasn't supposed to be seeing what i saw, it was as if the craft had entered through a dimensional/time(?) porthole, and the military jets i saw hadn't been invented in 1956 when this occurred, it took me over 50 yrs to finally tell someone about it because i thought nobody would ever believe me.. but this latest sighting really freaked me out. it wasn't a plane, i've lived within 10-12 miles of both midway & o'hare airports for 63 yrs ...I know a airplane or helicopter when i see one...This was something very different, the classic triangle craft we hear about... i'm still a little shaken...
content.summary: Very large triangle, appeared as an vague outline, extremely dim blueish lights lights
